# Elder Services - Ontario Region
## Tender Announcement
### Reference Number: cb-7487-40747797

#### Overview

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) invites interested suppliers to submit a statement of capabilities for the provision of Elder Services in the Ontario Region. This tender is set-aside for an Indigenous supplier, in accordance with the Government of Canada's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.

#### Background

The CSC provides programs and services to support the rehabilitation and reintegration of Indigenous offenders into their communities. The Elder Services program plays a crucial role in this process, offering spiritual and cultural support to offenders and promoting their connection to their traditional culture and community.

#### Requirements

The successful supplier will provide the following services:

* Spiritual and ceremonial services to Indigenous offenders, including counseling, teachings, and traditional ceremonies
* Advice and guidance to staff and management on Indigenous spirituality and cultural practices
* Case management support for Indigenous offenders, including case conferences and progress reports
* Regional and national contributions to the development of Indigenous programs and services
* Quarterly reporting to the Technical Authority on services provided and hours worked

#### Key Criteria

* The supplier must be recognized by their community as an Elder/Cultural Advisor
* The supplier must have a minimum of 5 years of experience providing spiritual and cultural services to Indigenous peoples in the past 10 years
* The supplier must be familiar with and able to conduct a variety of traditional ceremonies and provide guidance on the protocols surrounding the use, disposition, and searching of traditional medicines and spiritual effects

#### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation will be based on the supplier's statement of capabilities, which must clearly demonstrate their ability to meet the requirements set out in the tender. A meeting with a circle of Elders already under contract with CSC may be required to validate the supplier's experience and knowledge.

#### Exclusions and/or Limited Tendering Reasons

This procurement is not subject to any trade agreement. The CSC reserves the right to terminate or modify the procurement process at any time.

#### Closing Date and Time

The closing date and time for accepting statements of capabilities is August 7, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST.
